description:
Keep your sweaty tips dry with the power of the sea. This chalk is sourced using a solar evaporation process and the mineral contents of sea water, resulting in a high-grade chunky chalk with an exceptionally low energy and environmental footprint.

  • Pure magnesium carbonate without any fillers or drying agents
  • Sourced as a byproduct of the salt industry, rather than mined
  • Plant-based packaging is fully recyclable
name: Midnight Lightning Chunky Seawater Sourced Chalk 275g
